metadata.name: He's a Phantom [SFX]
metadata.description:
[img=https://i.imgur.com/mz7QXQ3.png][/img] This mod simply plays a part of the Danny Phantom Theme, "He's a Phantom", whenever Isaac becomes a ghost in Downpour/Dross.
Issues? Report it [url=https://github.com/machasins/isaac_phantom_mod/issues]here[/url] or in the comments of this mod.
Can be configured with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]Mod Config Menu[/url] to adjust how loud the sound is.
Thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/@lazymattman]Lazy Mattman[/url] for inspiration. I used [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3034946842]Emote Binds[/url] for the creation of the demo videos.
This is truly a Mattman moment.
